title: At Avdiyivka direction Russian army shelled Novobakhmutivka, Semenivka, Umanske, Netaylove of Donetsk region, - General Staff...
content: At Avdiyivka direction Russian army shelled Novobakhmutivka, Semenivka, Umanske, Netaylove of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
